name: I Exist And So I Scream
name_original: I Exist And So I Scream
description:
I exist and so I scream.

Probably.

Maybe.

A sound board you should definitely not use.

Includes audio provided by:

  • Yisu
  • Thiberos
  • Magres
  • Memnosyne
  • Aldous Grey

  • Sid Seedy
  • Grumlarkin

Requires AutoHotkeys to play.

Submitted to:

  • Not a Game Jam Game Jam 2021
  • Playful Creative Process Jam
  • Finally Finish Something 2022

Additional bonus audio set is some clips of Majima from Yakuza. Use prefix maji in AudioSets.txt to play that
